scripts.start:prod: yarn build:sw:fake-prod && yarn build && yarn start:server
scripts.start:server: yarn ws --port 4200 --hostname 0.0.0.0 --directory dist/apps/island-explorer --spa index.html --http2 --cert cert/localhost.crt --key cert/localhost.key -z
scripts.build:sw: yarn build:sw:pre && nx run service-worker:build --buildable --deleteOutputPath --skipNxCache && yarn build:sw:post
scripts.build:sw:pre: shx cp libs/service-worker/src/version.json libs/service-worker/src/version.json.orig && yarn prebuild
scripts.build:sw:post: shx cp libs/service-worker/src/version.json.orig libs/service-worker/src/version.json && shx rm libs/service-worker/src/version.json.orig
scripts.build:sw:fake-prod: yarn build:sw:fake-prod:pre && yarn build:sw && yarn build:sw:fake-prod:post
scripts.build:sw:fake-prod:pre: shx cp libs/service-worker/src/paths.json libs/service-worker/src/paths.json.orig && shx cp libs/service-worker/src/paths.fake-prod.json libs/service-worker/src/paths.json
scripts.build:sw:fake-prod:post: shx cp libs/service-worker/src/paths.json.orig libs/service-worker/src/paths.json && shx rm libs/service-worker/src/paths.json.orig
scripts.build:sw:prod: yarn build:sw:prod:pre && yarn build:sw && yarn build:sw:prod:post
scripts.build:sw:prod:pre: shx cp libs/service-worker/src/paths.json libs/service-worker/src/paths.json.orig && shx cp libs/service-worker/src/paths.prod.json libs/service-worker/src/paths.json
scripts.build:sw:prod:post: shx cp libs/service-worker/src/paths.json.orig libs/service-worker/src/paths.json && shx rm libs/service-worker/src/paths.json.orig
